title.native: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ 2nd Season
title.romaji: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e 2nd Season

description:
The second season of Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e.

Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School seems like a paradise, but in reality, it is an extreme meritocracy. In the class of underachievers, Kiyotaka has begun working with Suzune, who seeks to ascend higher. After a survival test on an uninhabited island, they get to enjoy a luxury liner, but a new class-scrambling test will begin.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: ขอต้อนรับสู่ห้องเรียนนิยม (เฉพาะ) ยอดคน ภาค 2
Добро пожаловать в класс для особо одарённых 2
歡迎來到實力至上主義的教室 第二季

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Rotoscoping
tags.description: Animation technique that animators use to trace over motion picture footage, frame by frame, to produce realistic action.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Asexual
tags.description: Features a character who isn't sexually attracted to people of any sex or gender.

node.description: A Japanese writer who also works as a visual novel scenario writer.

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.
A former Studio Easter employee. Debuted as an art director on [Guin Saga](https://anilist.co/anime/5041/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/soft_okuda) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/奥田維城)

Affiliated with Swara Pro.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - What is evil? Whatever springs from weakness.
Episode 2 - It takes a great talent and skill to conceal one's talent and skill.
Episode 3 - Man is an animal that makes bargains: no other animal does this - no dog exchanges bones with another.
Episode 4 - We should not be upset that others hide the truth from us, when we hide it so often from ourselves.
Episode 6 - There are two kinds of lies; one concerns an accomplished fact, the other concerns a future duty.
Episode 7 - Nothing is as dangerous as an ignorant friend; a wise enemy is to be preferred
Episode 8 - Abandon all hope, ye who enter here.
Episode 9 - Man is condemned to be free.
Episode 10 - Every man has in himself the most dangerous traitor of all
Episode 11 - What people commonly call fate is mostly their own stupidity.
Episode 12 - Genius lives only one story above madness.
